thread.title: Happy customer
thread.title_full: Bake Me A Wish! reviewed by Happy customer

author: Happy customer
title: Happy customer
text: Great alternative birthday surprise for my sister. She was overjoyed to receive her cake! Ordering was easy and cake was delivered around 10am to her job in NJ (paid extra for delivery before noon). I didn't get to try the cake, but she said it was delicious (yellow cake with chocolate filling). The only thing I would have liked is if an option to write a message on the cake was available.
